color.html.title: Colors
color.html.contents: $brand-colors (Map) scss $brand-colors: ( '_brand-main': hsl(195, 52%, 31%), '_brand-accent': hsl(330, 100%, 45%) ( 'shade': 25% #000, ), '_brand-gray': '#_brand-main' ( 'desaturate': 30%, ), ); The brand is defined by our primary brand blue, along with secondary pink and orange base colors. Color Previews _brand-main #266478 rgb(38, 100, 120) hsl(195, 52%, 31%) _brand-accent #ad0056 rgb(173, 0, 86) hsl(330, 100%, 34%) _brand-gray #3e5860 rgb(62, 88, 96) hsl(194, 22%, 31%) $shade-colors (Map) scss $shade-colors: shades-of($brand-colors, 5); Tints and shades of the brand colors. Color Previews _brand-main-dark-5 #0d2128 rgb(13, 33, 40) hsl(196, 51%, 10%) _brand-main-dark-4 #1e4e5d rgb(30, 78, 93) hsl(194, 51%, 24%) _brand-main-dark-3 #266478 rgb(38, 100, 120) hsl(195, 52%, 31%) _brand-main-dark-2 #336d80 rgb(51, 109, 128) hsl(195, 43%, 35%) _brand-main-dark-1 #4d8091 rgb(77, 128, 145) hsl(195, 31%, 44%) _brand-main-0 #6893a1 rgb(104, 147, 161) hsl(195, 23%, 52%) _brand-accent-dark-1 #bc2e75 rgb(188, 46, 117) hsl(330, 61%, 46%) _brand-accent-0 #c64d89 rgb(198, 77, 137) hsl(330, 51%, 54%) _brand-accent-light-1 #d06c9e rgb(208, 108, 158) hsl(330, 52%, 62%) 86%) _brand-accent-light-5 #f8e8f0 rgb(248, 232, 240) hsl(330, 53%, 94%) _brand-gray-dark-5 #151d20 rgb(21, 29, 32) hsl(196, 21%, 10%) _brand-gray-dark-4 #30444b rgb(48, 68, 75) hsl(196, 22%, 24%) _brand-gray-dark-3 #3e5860 rgb(62, 88, 96) hsl(194, 22%, 31%) _brand-gray-dark-2 #4a626a rgb(74, 98, 106) hsl(195, 18%, 35%) _brand-gray-dark-1 #61767d rgb(97, 118, 125) hsl(195, 13%, 44%) _brand-gray-0 #788b90 rgb(120, 139, 144) hsl(193, 10%, 52%) _brand-gray-light-1 #909fa3 rgb(144, 159, 163) hsl(193, 9%, 60%) _brand-gray-light-2 #a7b3b7 rgb(167, 179, 183) hsl(195, 10%, 69%) _brand-gray-light-3 #bfc7ca rgb(191, 199, 202) hsl(196, 9%, 77%) _brand-gray-light-4 #d6dcdd rgb(214, 220, 221) hsl(189, 9%, 85%) _brand-gray-light-5 #edf0f1 rgb(237, 240, 241) hsl(195, 12%, 94%) $contrast-colors (Map) scss $contrast-colors: ( '_contrast-light': color('#_brand-gray-light-5'), '_contrast-dark': color('#_brand-main-dark-5'), ); The light and dark contrast colors act as the high and low range of our palette. These colors should not be dynamic. Color Previews _contrast-light #edf0f1 rgb(237, 240, 241) hsl(195, 12%, 94%) _contrast-dark #0d2128 rgb(13, 33, 40) hsl(196, 51%, 10%) $theme-colors (Map) scss $theme-colors: ( 'background': '#_contrast-light', 'text': '#_brand-main-dark-4', 'text-light': '#_brand-main-dark-2', 'text-shadow': #fff, 'invert-shadow': #000, 'amp': '#text-light', 'border': '#_brand-gray-0', 'border-light': '#_brand-gray-light-1', 'action': '#_brand-accent-dark-2', 'action-underline': '#_brand-accent-light-2', 'action-hover': '#_brand-accent-dark-4', ); Main theme colors will be set as relative CSS variables – applying the above colors to more specific use-cases. Color Previews background #edf0f1 rgb(237, 240, 241) hsl(195, 12%, 94%) text #205566 rgb(32, 85, 102) hsl(195, 52%, 26%) text-light, amp #326c7f rgb(50, 108, 127) hsl(195, 44%, 35%) text-shadow #ffffff rgb(255, 255, 255) hsl(0, 0%, 100%) invert-shadow #000000 rgb(0, 0, 0) hsl(0, 0%, 0%) border #73868c rgb(115, 134, 140) hsl(194, 10%, 50%) border-light #88989e rgb(136, 152, 158) hsl(196, 10%, 58%) action #b10f5f rgb(177, 15, 95) hsl(330, 84%, 38%) action-underline #d083ab rgb(208, 131, 171) hsl(329, 45%, 66%) action-hover #89074c rgb(137, 7, 76) hsl(328, 90%, 28%) $invert-colors (Map) scss $invert-colors: ( 'background': '#_contrast-dark', 'text': '#_brand-main-light-4', 'text-light': '#_brand-main-light-2', 'text-shadow': #000, 'invert-shadow': #fff, 'amp': '#text-light', 'border': '#_brand-gray-0', 'border-light': '#_brand-gray-dark-1', 'action': '#_brand-accent' ( 'lighten': 45%, ), 'action-underline': '#_brand-accent-0', 'action-hover': '#action' ( 'lighten': 5%, ), ); Inverted theme colors for light-on-dark mode. Color Previews background #0d2128 rgb(13, 33, 40) hsl(196, 51%, 10%) text #c3d2d7 rgb(195, 210, 215) hsl(195, 20%, 80%) text-light #93b0ba rgb(147, 176, 186) hsl(195, 22%, 65%) text-shadow #000000 rgb(0, 0, 0) hsl(0, 0%, 0%) invert-shadow #ffffff rgb(255, 255, 255) hsl(0, 0%, 100%) amp #326c7f rgb(50, 108, 127) hsl(195, 44%, 35%) border #73868c rgb(115, 134, 140) hsl(194, 10%, 50%) border-light #5e747a rgb(94, 116, 122) hsl(193, 13%, 42%) action #ff94c9 rgb(255, 148, 201) hsl(330, 100%, 79%) action-underline #c04985 rgb(192, 73, 133) hsl(330, 49%, 52%) action-hover #c9116c rgb(201, 17, 108) hsl(330, 84%, 43%)

fonts.html.title: Fonts
fonts.html.contents: Font Configuration Related Accoutrement Type [external] $body-font scss $body-font: ( 'name': 'freight-text-pro', 'stack': ( 'Baskerville', 'Palatino', 'Cambria', 'Georgia', 'serif', ), 'source': 'https://typekit.com/fonts/freight-text', ); Freight Text Pro is the primary font of the OddBird brand. Font Preview freight-text-pro (body) css font-family: freight-text-pro, Baskerville, Palatino, Cambria, Georgia, serif; $code-font scss $code-font: ( 'name': 'Dank Mono', 'normal': ( 'woff2': 'dankmono/dankmono-regular-webfont', 'woff': 'dankmono/dankmono-regular-webfont', ), 'italic': ( 'woff2': 'dankmono/dankmono-italic-webfont', 'woff': 'dankmono/dankmono-italic-webfont', ), 'stack': ( 'Consolas', 'Menlo', 'Monaco', 'Lucida Console', 'Liberation Mono', 'DejaVu Sans Mono', 'Bitstream Vera Sans Mono', 'Courier New', 'monospace', ), ); A readable monospace font for code previews Font Preview Dank Mono (code) css font-family: 'Dank Mono', Consolas, Menlo, Monaco, 'Lucida Console', 'Liberation Mono', 'DejaVu Sans Mono', 'Bitstream Vera Sans Mono', 'Courier New', monospace; $amp-font scss $amp-font: ( 'name': 'amp', 'stack': ( 'freight-text-pro', 'Baskerville', 'Palatino', 'Cambria', 'Georgia', 'serif', ), 'italic': ( 'woff2': 'data:application/font-woff2;charset=utf-8;base64,', 'woff': 'data:application/font-woff;charset=utf-8;base64,', ), ); Baskerville Italic provides a nice-looking ampersand

grid-vars.html.title: grid-vars
grid-vars.html.contents: Grids » CSS Variables $grid-var-prefix (string) scss $grid-var-prefix: 'grid-'; Set a prefix for all grid-tokens, and we’ll apply it when setting or calling css variables based on your grid maps. Set to null or '' (empty string) for no prefix. Used By @mixin grids--() @mixin grid--() @function var-grid() @mixin grids--() Convert any grid-map into CSS variables, using the global $grid-var-prefix. Parameters & Output $source: $grids (map) Optionally use a custom map of grids to set as css variables {CSS output} (code block) Custom properties for all public grids in the map Requires $grid-var-prefix (string) @mixin grid--() Set a single custom property based on a map-color, with optional alias and fallback Parameters $grid: (*) Color name available in the $source map, or alias to use in naming the CSS variable $value: null (string | null) Optional value for the variable, if different from the given $grid $fallback: true (*) The optional fallback value for a var() function: true will generate a fallback based on the token value A token name will fallback to the value of that css-variable and then to the token’s calculated value Any other fallback will be passed through unchanged $source: $grids (map) Optional map of grids to use as a palette source Requires $grid-var-prefix (string) @function var-grid() Access the CSS variable associated with a given token, along with a fallback value based on the token itself Parameters & Return $grid: (*) Color name available in the $source map $fallback: true (*) The optional fallback value for a var() function: true will generate a fallback based on the token value A token name will fallback to the value of that css-variable and then to the token’s calculated value Any other fallback will be passed through unchanged $source: (map) Optional Accoutrement map of grids to use as source @return (string) CSS variable call, in the format: var(--<token>, <fallback>) Requires $grid-var-prefix (string)

index.html.title: Miriam Suzanne Documentation
index.html.contents: View Project mia eleventy source for miriamsuzanne.com Develop: Install dependencies: yarn Compile and run Eleventy server, with a watcher for Sass files: gulp The site will be compiled into _site/ for simple gh-pages deployment, and the served site will be available at localhost:8080 or e.g. mia.hexxie.com:8080. You can also run individual commands: # build the static site gulp build # run the server gulp serve # minify images gulp imagemin # compile sass gulp sass # lint sass gulp sasslint # format sass gulp prettier # compile sass docs gulp sassdoc # watch sass files (lint & docs & compile) gulp watch Sass Docs are compiled into the _site/style/ folder, which is then available at the URL: /style/.

scale.html.title: Ratios & Sizes
scale.html.contents: Scale Settings Related Accoutrement Scale [external] $modular-scale scss $modular-scale: ( 'text-ratio': 1.4, ); Ratio text-ratio (1.4) Step Value -3 0.36 -2 0.51 -1 0.71 — base 1 1.4 2 1.96 3 2.74 $text-sizes scss $text-sizes: ( 'root': 18px, 'responsive': 'calc(#root + 0.5vw)', 'large-root': 1rem ( 'text-ratio': 1, ), 'large': 'calc(1rem + 0.25vw)', 'xlarge': 'calc(#large-root + 4.5vw)', 'small': 1rem ( 'text-ratio': -0.5, ), 'xsmall': 1rem ( 'text-ratio': -1, ), 'code': 0.875em, 'intro': '#large', 'h1': '#xlarge', 'h2': '#large', ); Size Previews Name Value root 18px Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. responsive calc(18px + 0.5vw) Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. large-root 1.4rem Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. large, intro, h2 calc(1rem + 0.25vw) Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. xlarge, h1 calc(1.4rem + 4.5vw) Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. small 0.8451542547rem Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. xsmall 0.7142857143rem Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. code 0.875em Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. $spacing-sizes scss $spacing-sizes: ( 'rhythm': '#root' ( 'text-ratio': 1, 'convert-units': 'rem', ), 'gutter': '#rhythm', 'double-gutter': '#gutter' ( 'times': 2, ), 'spacer': calc(%s + %s) ( '%s': '#double-gutter' 6vmin, ), 'shim': '#gutter' ( 'times': 0.5, ), 'half-shim': '#shim' ( 'times': 0.5, ), 'quarter-shim': '#shim' ( 'times': 0.25, ), ); Size Previews Name Value rhythm, gutter 1.4rem double-gutter 2.8rem spacer calc(2.8rem + 6vmin) shim 0.7rem half-shim 0.35rem quarter-shim 0.175rem $component-sizes scss $component-sizes: ( 'icon': 1em, 'section-border': '#half-shim', 'grid-margin': size('shim'), ); Size Previews Name Value icon 1em section-border 0.35rem grid-margin 0.7rem $page-sizes scss $page-sizes: ( 'page': 36rem, 'half': '#page' ( 'divide': 2, ), 'quarter': '#page' ( 'divide': 4, ), ); Size Previews Name Value page 36rem half 18rem quarter 9rem $breakpoints scss $breakpoints: ( 'page-break': '#page' ( 'convert-units': 'browser-ems', ), 'wide': '#page-break' ( 'times': 1.5, ), );
